text.en: In the language of India:Ārya-Bhadracaryā-Praṇidhāna-Rāja
text.en-trans: gyagar ké du arya bhadratsarya pranidhana radza

text.en: In the language of Tibet:Pakpa Zangpo Chöpé Mönlam gyi Gyalpo
text.en-trans: böké du pakpa zangpo chöpé mönlam gyi gyalpo

text.en: Homage to Mañjuśrī, the youthful!
text.en-trans: jampal zhönnur gyurpa la chaktsal lo

text.en: To all the buddhas, the lions of the human race,
text.en-trans: jinyé su dak chok chü jikten na

text.en: In all directions of the universe, through past and present and future:
text.en-trans: dü sum shekpa mi yi sengé kün

text.en: To every single one of you, I bow in homage;
text.en-trans: dak gi malü dedak tamché la

text.en: Devotion fills my body, speech and mind.
text.en-trans: lü dang ngak yi dangwé chak gyi o

text.en: Through the power of this prayer, aspiring to Good Action,
text.en-trans: zangpo chöpé mönlam tob dak gi

text.en: All the victorious ones appear, vivid here before my mind
text.en-trans: gyalwa tamché yi kyi ngönsum du

text.en: And I multiply my body as many times as atoms in the universe,
text.en-trans: zhing gi dul nyé lü rab tüpa yi

text.en: Each one bowing in prostration to all the buddhas.
text.en-trans: gyalwa kün la rabtu chaktsal lo

text.en: In every atom preside as many buddhas as there are atoms,
text.en-trans: dul chik teng na dul nyé sangye nam

text.en: And around them, all their bodhisattva heirs:
text.en-trans: sangye sé kyi ü na zhukpa dak

text.en: And so I imagine them filling
text.en-trans: detar chö kyi ying nam malüpa

text.en: Completely the entire space of reality.
text.en-trans: tamché gyalwa dak gi gangwar mö

text.en: Saluting them with an endless ocean of praise,
text.en-trans: dedak ngakpa mizé gyatso nam

text.en: With the sounds of an ocean of different melodies
text.en-trans: yang kyi yenlak gyatsö dra kün gyi

text.en: I sing of the buddhas’ noble qualities,
text.en-trans: gyalwa kün gyi yönten rab jö ching

text.en: And praise all those who have gone to perfect bliss.
text.en-trans: dewar shekpa tamché dak gi tö

text.en: To every buddha, I make offerings:
text.en-trans: metok dampa trengwa dampa dang

text.en: Of the loveliest flowers, of beautiful garlands,
text.en-trans: silnyen nam dang jukpa duk chok dang

text.en: Of music and perfumed ointments, the best of parasols,
text.en-trans: marmé chok dang dukpö dampa yi

text.en: The brightest lamps and finest incense.
text.en-trans: gyalwa dedak la ni chöpar gyi

text.en: To every buddha, I make offerings:
text.en-trans: naza dampa nam dang dri chok dang

text.en: Exquisite garments and the most fragrant scents,
text.en-trans: chema purma rirab nyampa dang

text.en: Powdered incense, heaped as high as Mount Meru,
text.en-trans: köpa khyepar pakpé chok kün gyi

text.en: Arranged in perfect symmetry.
text.en-trans: gyalwa dedak la ni chöpar gyi

text.en: Then the vast and unsurpassable offerings—
text.en-trans: chöpa gang nam lamé gya chewa

text.en: Inspired by my devotion to all the buddhas, and
text.en-trans: dedak gyalwa tamché la yang mö

text.en: Moved by the power of my faith in Good Actions—
text.en-trans: zangpo chö la depé tob dak gi

text.en: I prostrate and offer to all you victorious ones.
text.en-trans: gyalwa kün la chaktsal chöpar gyi

text.en: Whatever negative acts I have committed,
text.en-trans: döchak zhedang timuk wang gi ni

text.en: While driven by desire, hatred and ignorance,
text.en-trans: lü dang ngak dang dezhin yi kyi kyang

text.en: With my body, my speech and also with my mind,
text.en-trans: dikpa dak gi gyipa chi chipa

text.en: Before you, I confess and purify each and every one.
text.en-trans: dedak tamché dak gi sosor shak

text.en: With a heart full of delight, I rejoice at all the merits
text.en-trans: chok chü gyalwa kün dang sangye sé

text.en: Of buddhas and bodhisattvas,
text.en-trans: ranggyal nam dang lob dang mi lob dang

text.en: Pratyekabuddhas, those in training and the arhats beyond training,
text.en-trans: drowa kün gyi sönam gangla yang

text.en: And every living being, throughout the entire universe.
text.en-trans: dedak kün gyi jesu dak yi rang

text.en: You who are like beacons of light shining through the worlds,
text.en-trans: gang nam chok chü jikten drönma nam

text.en: Who passed through the stages of enlightenment, to attain buddhahood, freedom from all attachment,
text.en-trans: changchub rimpar sangye machak nyé

text.en: I exhort you: all of you protectors,
text.en-trans: gönpo dedak dak gi tamché la

text.en: Turn the unsurpassable wheel of Dharma.
text.en-trans: khorlo lanamepar korwar kul

text.en: Joining my palms together, I pray
text.en-trans: nya ngen da tön gang zhé dedak la

text.en: To you who intend to pass into nirvāṇa,
text.en-trans: drowa kün la pen zhing dewé chir

text.en: Remain, for aeons as many as the atoms in this world,
text.en-trans: kalpa zhing gi dul nyé zhukpar yang

text.en: And bring well-being and happiness to all living beings.
text.en-trans: dak gi talmo rab jar solwar gyi

text.en: What little virtue I have gathered through my homage,
text.en-trans: chaktsalwa dang chö ching shakpa dang

text.en: Through offering, confession, and rejoicing,
text.en-trans: jesu yi rang kul zhing solwa yi

text.en: Through exhortation and prayer—all of it
text.en-trans: gewa chungzé dak gi chi sakpa

text.en: I dedicate to the enlightenment of all beings!
text.en-trans: tamché dak gi changchub chir ngo o

text.en: Let offerings be made to buddhas of the past,
text.en-trans: depé sangye nam dang chok chu yi

text.en: And all who now dwell throughout the ten directions of this universe!
text.en-trans: jikten dak na gang zhuk chöpar gyur

text.en: Let all who are yet to come swiftly fulfil their wishes
text.en-trans: gangyang majön dedak rab nyurwar

text.en: And attain the stages of enlightenment and buddhahood!
text.en-trans: sam dzok changchub rimpar sangye chön

text.en: Let as many worlds as there are in all the ten directions
text.en-trans: chok chu galé zhing nam jinyepa

text.en: Transform into realms that are vast and utterly pure,
text.en-trans: dedak gyacher yongsu dakpar gyur

text.en: Filled with buddhas who have sat before the mighty bodhi tree,
text.en-trans: changchub shingwang drung shek gyalwa dang

text.en: Around them all their bodhisattva sons and daughters!
text.en-trans: sangye sé kyi rabtu gangwar shok

text.en: Let as many sentient beings as there are in all the ten directions
text.en-trans: chok chü semchen gang nam jinyé pa

text.en: Live always and forever in happiness and health!
text.en-trans: dedak taktu nemé dewar gyur

text.en: Let all beings meet the Dharma
text.en-trans: drowa kün gyi chö kyi dön nam ni

text.en: That befits them best! And so may all they hope for be fulfilled!
text.en-trans: tünpar gyur ching rewa ang drubpar shok

text.en: As I practise the training for enlightenment,
text.en-trans: changchub chöpa dak ni dak chö ching

text.en: May I recall all my previous births,
text.en-trans: drowa küntu kyewa drenpar gyur

text.en: And in my successive lives, through death and through rebirth,
text.en-trans: tserab küntu chipo kyewa na

text.en: May I always renounce the worldly life!
text.en-trans: taktu dak ni rabtu jungwar shok

text.en: Training in the footsteps of all the victorious buddhas,
text.en-trans: gyalwa kün gyi jesu lob gyur té

text.en: May I bring Good Actions to perfection,
text.en-trans: zangpo chöpa yongsu dzok jé ching

text.en: And my moral conduct be taintless and pure,
text.en-trans: tsultrim chöpa drimé yong dakpa

text.en: Never lapsing, and always free from fault!
text.en-trans: taktu manyam kyönmé chöpar shok

text.en: In the language of the gods, nāgas, and yakṣas,
text.en-trans: lha yi ké dang lu dang nöjin ké

text.en: In the language of demons and of humans too,
text.en-trans: drulbum dak dang mi yi ké nam dang

text.en: In however many kinds of speech there may be—
text.en-trans: drowa kün gyi dra nam ji tsampar

text.en: I shall proclaim the Dharma in the language of all!
text.en-trans: tamché ké du dak gi chö ten to

text.en: Taming my mind, and striving in the pāramitās,
text.en-trans: dé shing parol chin la rab tsön té

text.en: I will never forget the bodhicitta;
text.en-trans: changchub sem ni namyang jé magyur

text.en: May all my harmful actions and the obscurations they cause
text.en-trans: dikpa gang nam dribpar gyurpa dak

text.en: Be completely purified, every single one!
text.en-trans: dedak malü yongsu jangwar shok

text.en: May I be freed from karma, harmful emotions, and the work of negativity,
text.en-trans: lé dang nyönmong dü kyi lé nam lé

text.en: And act for all beings in the world,
text.en-trans: drol zhing jikten drowa nam su yang

text.en: Just like the lotus flower to which mud and water cannot cling,
text.en-trans: jitar pemo chü michakpa zhin

text.en: Or sun and moon that course unhindered through the sky.
text.en-trans: nyida namkhar tokpamé tar ché

text.en: Throughout the reach and range of the entire universe
text.en-trans: zhing gi khyön dang chok nam chi tsampar

text.en: I shall pacify completely the suffering of all the lower realms,
text.en-trans: ngensong dukngal rabtu zhiwar jé

text.en: I shall lead all beings to happiness,
text.en-trans: dewa dak la drowa kün gö ching

text.en: And work for the ultimate benefit of each and every one!
text.en-trans: drowa tamché la ni penpar ché

text.en: I shall bring enlightened action to perfection,
text.en-trans: changchub chöpa yongsu dzokjé ching

text.en: Serve beings so as to suit their needs,
text.en-trans: semchen dak gi chö dang tünpar juk

text.en: Teach them to accomplish Good Actions,
text.en-trans: zangpo chöpa dak ni rab tön ching

text.en: And continue this, throughout all the aeons to come!
text.en-trans: ma ong kalpa küntu chöpar gyur

text.en: May I always meet and be accompanied by
text.en-trans: dak gi chö dang tsungpar gang chöpa

text.en: Those whose actions accord with mine;
text.en-trans: dedak dang ni taktu drokpar shok

text.en: And in body, speech and mind as well,
text.en-trans: lü dang ngak nam dang ni sem kyi kyang

text.en: May our actions and aspirations always be one!
text.en-trans: chöpa dak dang mönlam chik tu ché

text.en: May I always meet spiritual friends
text.en-trans: dak la penpar döpé drokpo dak

text.en: Who long to be of true help to me,
text.en-trans: zangpo chöpa rabtu tönpa nam

text.en: And who teach me the Good Actions;
text.en-trans: dedak dang yang taktu trepar shok

text.en: Never will I disappoint them!
text.en-trans: dedak dak gi namyang yi miyung

text.en: May I always behold the buddhas, here before my eyes,
text.en-trans: sangye sé kyi korwé gönpo nam

text.en: And around them all their bodhisattva sons and daughters.
text.en-trans: ngönsum taktu dak gi gyalwa ta

text.en: Without ever tiring, throughout all the aeons to come,
text.en-trans: ma ong kalpa küntu mikyowar

text.en: May the offerings I make them be endless and vast!
text.en-trans: dedak la yang chöpa gyacher gyi

text.en: May I maintain the sacred teachings of the buddhas,
text.en-trans: gyalwa nam kyi dampé chö dzin ching

text.en: And cause enlightened action to appear;
text.en-trans: changchub chöpa küntu nangwar jé

text.en: May I train to perfection in Good Actions,
text.en-trans: zangpo chöpa nampar jongwa yang

text.en: And practise these in every age to come!
text.en-trans: ma ong kalpa küntu chepar gyi

text.en: As I wander through all states of samsaric existence,
text.en-trans: sipa tamché du yang khorwa na

text.en: May I gather inexhaustible merit and wisdom,
text.en-trans: sönam yeshe dak ni mizé nyé

text.en: And so become an inexhaustible treasury of noble qualities—
text.en-trans: tab dang sherab tingdzin namtar dang

text.en: Of skill and discernment, samādhi and liberation!
text.en-trans: yönten kün gyi mizé dzö du gyur

text.en: In a single atom may I see as many pure realms as atoms in the universe:
text.en-trans: dul chik teng na dul nyé zhing nam té

text.en: And in each realm, buddhas beyond all imagining,
text.en-trans: zhing der sam gyi mikhyab sangye nam

text.en: Encircled by all their bodhisattva heirs.
text.en-trans: sangye sé kyi ü na zhukpa la

text.en: Along with them, may I perform the actions of enlightenment!
text.en-trans: changchub chepa chö ching tawar gyi

text.en: And so, in each direction, everywhere,
text.en-trans: detar malü tamché chok su yang

text.en: Even on the tip of a hair, may I see an ocean of buddhas—
text.en-trans: tra tsam khyön la dü sum tsé nyé kyi

text.en: All to come in past, present and future—in an ocean of pure realms,
text.en-trans: sangye gyatso zhing nam gyatso dang

text.en: And throughout an ocean of aeons, may I enter into enlightened action in each and every one!
text.en-trans: kalpa gyatso chö ching rabtu juk

text.en: Each single word of a buddha’s speech, that voice with its ocean of qualities,
text.en-trans: sung chik yenlak gyatsö draké kyi

text.en: Bears all the purity of the speech of all the buddhas,
text.en-trans: gyalwa kün yang yenlak namdakpa

text.en: Sounds that harmonize with the minds of all living beings:
text.en-trans: drowa kün gyi sampa jizhin yang

text.en: May I always be engaged with the speech of the buddhas!
text.en-trans: sangye sung la taktu jukpar gyi

text.en: With all the power of my mind, may I hear and realize
text.en-trans: dü sum shekpé gyalwa tamché dak

text.en: The inexhaustible melody of the teachings spoken by
text.en-trans: khorlö tsul nam rabtu korwa yi

text.en: All the buddhas of past, present and future,
text.en-trans: dedak gi yang sung yang mizé la

text.en: As they turn the wheels of Dharma!
text.en-trans: lo yi tob kyi dak kyang rabtu juk

text.en: Just as the wisdom of the buddhas penetrates all future aeons,
text.en-trans: ma ong kalpa tamché jukpar yang

text.en: So may I too know them, instantly,
text.en-trans: kechik chik gi dak kyang jukpar gyi

text.en: And in each fraction of an instant may I know
text.en-trans: gangyang kalpa dü sum tsé dedak

text.en: All that will ever be, in past, present and future!
text.en-trans: kechik chashé kyi ni zhukpar ché

text.en: In an instant, may I behold all those who are the lions of the human race—
text.en-trans: dü sum shekpa mi yi sengé gang

text.en: The buddhas of past, present and future!
text.en-trans: dedak kechik chik la dak gi ta

text.en: May I always be engaged in the buddhas’ way of life and action,
text.en-trans: taktu dedak gi ni chöyul la

text.en: Through the power of liberation, where all is realized as like an illusion!
text.en-trans: gyumar gyurpé namtar tob kyi juk

text.en: On a single atom, may I actually bring about
text.en-trans: gangyang dü sum dak gi zhing köpa

text.en: The entire array of pure realms of past, of present and future;
text.en-trans: dedak dul chik tengdu ngönpar drub

text.en: And then enter into those pure buddha realms
text.en-trans: detar malü chok nam tamché du

text.en: In each atom, and in each and every direction.
text.en-trans: gyalwa dak gi zhing nam kö la juk

text.en: When those who illuminate the world, still to come,
text.en-trans: gangyang majön jikten drönma nam

text.en: Gradually attain buddhahood, turn the Wheel of Dharma,
text.en-trans: dedak rimpar tsang gya khorlo kor

text.en: And demonstrate the final, profound peace of nirvāṇa:
text.en-trans: nya ngen depa rabtu zhi ta tön

text.en: May I be always in their presence!
text.en-trans: gönpo kün gyi drung du dak chi o

text.en: Through the power of swift miracles,
text.en-trans: küntu nyurwé dzutrul tob nam dang

text.en: The power of the vehicle, like a doorway,
text.en-trans: künné go yi tekpé tob dak dang

text.en: The power of conduct that possesses all virtuous qualities,
text.en-trans: küntu yönten chöpé tob nam dang

text.en: The power of loving kindness, all-pervasive,
text.en-trans: küntu khyabpa jampa dak gi tob

text.en: The power of merit that is totally virtuous,
text.en-trans: künné gewé sönam tob dak dang

text.en: The power of wisdom free from attachment, and
text.en-trans: chakpa mepar gyurpé yeshe tob

text.en: The powers of knowledge, skilful means and samādhi,
text.en-trans: sherab tab dang tingdzin tob dak gi

text.en: May I perfectly accomplish the power of enlightenment!
text.en-trans: changchub tob nam yangdak drubpar jé

text.en: May I purify the power of karma;
text.en-trans: lé kyi tob nam yongsu dakjé ching

text.en: Destroy the power of harmful emotions;
text.en-trans: nyönmong tob nam küntu jompar jé

text.en: Render negativity utterly powerless;
text.en-trans: dü kyi tob nam tobmé rabjé ching

text.en: And perfect the power of Good Actions!
text.en-trans: zangpo chöpé tob ni dzokpar gyi

text.en: I shall purify oceans of realms;
text.en-trans: zhing nam gyatso nampar dakjé ching

text.en: Liberate oceans of sentient beings;
text.en-trans: semchen gyatso dak ni nampar drol

text.en: Understand oceans of Dharma;
text.en-trans: chö nam gyatso rabtu tongjé ching

text.en: Realize oceans of wisdom;
text.en-trans: yeshe gyatso rabtu tokpar jé

text.en: Perfect oceans of actions;
text.en-trans: chöpa gyatso nampar dakjé ching

text.en: Fulfil oceans of aspirations;
text.en-trans: mönlam gyatso yongsu dzokpar jé

text.en: Serve oceans of buddhas!
text.en-trans: sangye gyatso rabtu chöjé ching

text.en: And perform these, without ever growing weary, through oceans of aeons!
text.en-trans: kalpa gyatso mikyo chepar gyi

text.en: All the buddhas throughout the whole of time,
text.en-trans: gangyang dü sum shekpé gyalwa yi

text.en: Attained enlightenment through Good Actions, and
text.en-trans: changchub chöpé mönlam jedrak nam

text.en: Their prayers and aspirations for enlightened action:
text.en-trans: zangpo chöpé changchub sangye né

text.en: May I fulfil them all completely!
text.en-trans: dé kün dak gi malü dzokpar gyi

text.en: The eldest of the sons of all the buddhas
text.en-trans: gyalwa kün gyi sé kyi tuwopa

text.en: Is called Samantabhadra: ‘All-good’—
text.en-trans: gang gi ming ni kuntuzang zheja

text.en: So that I may act with a skill like his,
text.en-trans: khepa dé dang tsungpar chepé chir

text.en: I dedicate fully all these merits!
text.en-trans: gewa didak tamché rabtu ngo

text.en: To purify my body, my speech and my mind as well,
text.en-trans: lü dang ngak dang yi kyang namdak ching

text.en: To purify my actions, and all realms,
text.en-trans: chöpa namdak zhing nam yong dakpa

text.en: May I be the equal of Samantabhadra
text.en-trans: ngowa zangpo khepa chindrawa

text.en: In his skill in good dedication!
text.en-trans: dendrar dak kyang dé dang tsungpar shok

text.en: In order to perform the full virtue of Good Actions,
text.en-trans: künné gewa zangpo chepé chir

text.en: I shall act according to Mañjuśrī's prayers of aspiration,
text.en-trans: jampal gyi ni mönlam chepar gyi

text.en: And without ever growing weary, in all the aeons to come,
text.en-trans: ma ong kalpa küntu mikyowar

text.en: I shall perfectly fulfil every one of his aims!
text.en-trans: dé yi jawa malü dzokpar gyi

text.en: Let my bodhisattva acts be beyond measure!
text.en-trans: chöpa dak ni tsé yö magyur chik

text.en: Let my enlightened qualities be measureless too!
text.en-trans: yönten nam kyang tsé zung mepar shok

text.en: Keeping to this immeasurable activity,
text.en-trans: chöpa tsemepa la né né kyang

text.en: May I accomplish all the miraculous powers of enlightenment!
text.en-trans: dedak trulpa tamché tsalwar gyi

text.en: Sentient beings are as limitless
text.en-trans: namkhé tartuk gyurpa ji tsampar

text.en: As the boundless expanse of space;
text.en-trans: semchen malü ta yang dezhin té

text.en: So shall my prayers of aspiration for them
text.en-trans: ji tsam lé dang nyönmong tar gyurpa

text.en: Be as limitless as their karma and harmful emotions!
text.en-trans: dak gi mönlam ta yang detsam mo

text.en: Whoever hears this king of dedication prayers,
text.en-trans: gangyang chok chü zhing nam tayepa

text.en: And yearns for supreme enlightenment,
text.en-trans: rinchen gyen té gyalwa nam la pul

text.en: Who even once arouses faith,
text.en-trans: lha dang mi yi dewé chok nam kyang

text.en: Will gain true merit greater still
text.en-trans: zhing gi dul nyé kalpar pulwa bé

text.en: Than by offering the victorious buddhas
text.en-trans: gang gi ngowé gyalpo di tö né

text.en: Infinite pure realms in every directions, all ornamented with jewels,
text.en-trans: changchub chok gi jesu rab mö shing

text.en: Or offering them all the highest joys of gods and humans
text.en-trans: len chik tsam yang depa kyepa na

text.en: For as many aeons as there are atoms in those realms.
text.en-trans: sönam dampé chok tu di gyur ro

text.en: Whoever truly makes this Aspiration to Good Actions,
text.en-trans: gang gi zangchö mönlam di tabpé

text.en: Will never again be born in lower realms;
text.en-trans: dé ni ngensong tamché pongwar gyur

text.en: They will be free from harmful companions, and
text.en-trans: dé ni drokpo ngenpa pangwa yin

text.en: Soon behold the Buddha of Boundless Light.
text.en-trans: nangwa tayé deyang dé nyur tong

text.en: They will acquire all kind of benefits, and live in happiness;
text.en-trans: dedak nyepa rab nyé dewar tso

text.en: Even in this present life all will go well,
text.en-trans: mitsé dir yang dedak lekpar ong

text.en: And before long,
text.en-trans: kuntuzangpo deyang chindrawar

text.en: They will become just like Samantabhadra.
text.en-trans: dedak ringpor mitok dezhin gyur

text.en: All negative acts—even the five of immediate retribution—
text.en-trans: tsammé ngapo dak gi dikpa nam

text.en: Whatever they have committed in the grip of ignorance,
text.en-trans: gang gi mishe wang gi jepa dak

text.en: Will soon be completely purified,
text.en-trans: dé yi zangpo chöpa di jö na

text.en: If they recite this Aspiration to Good Actions.
text.en-trans: nyurdu malü yongsu jangwar gyur

text.en: They will possess perfect wisdom, beauty, and excellent signs,
text.en-trans: yeshe dang ni zuk dang tsen nam dang

text.en: Be born in a good family, and with a radiant appearance.
text.en-trans: rik dang khadok nam dang denpar gyur

text.en: Demons and heretics will never harm them,
text.en-trans: dü dang mutek mangpö dé mitub

text.en: And all three worlds will honour them with offerings.
text.en-trans: jikten sumpo kün na ang chöpar gyur

text.en: They will quickly go beneath the bodhi-tree,
text.en-trans: changchub shingwang drung du dé nyur dro

text.en: And there, they will sit, to benefit all sentient beings, then
text.en-trans: song né semchen pen chir der duk té

text.en: Awaken into enlightenment, turn the wheel of Dharma,
text.en-trans: changchub sangye khorlo rabtu kor

text.en: And tame Māra with all his hordes.
text.en-trans: dü nam dé dang chepa tamché tul

text.en: The full result of keeping, teaching, or reading
text.en-trans: gangyang zangpo chöpé mönlam di

text.en: This Prayer of Aspiration to Good Actions
text.en-trans: changwa dang ni tön tam lok na yang

text.en: Is known to the buddhas alone:
text.en-trans: dé yi nampar minpa ang sangye khyen

text.en: Have no doubt: supreme enlightenment will be yours!
text.en-trans: changchub chok la somnyi majé chik

text.en: Just as the bodhisattva Mañjuśrī attained omniscience,
text.en-trans: jampal pawö jitar khyenpa dang

text.en: And Samantabhadra too
text.en-trans: kuntuzangpo deyang dezhin té

text.en: All these merits now I dedicate
text.en-trans: dedak kün gyi jesu dak lob chir

text.en: To train and follow in their footsteps.
text.en-trans: gewa didak tamché rabtu ngo

text.en: As all the victorious buddhas of past, present and future
text.en-trans: dü sum shekpé gyalwa tamché kyi

text.en: Praise dedication as supreme,
text.en-trans: ngowa gangla chok tu ngakpa dé

text.en: So now I dedicate all these roots of virtue
text.en-trans: dak gi gewé tsawa di kün kyang

text.en: For all beings to perfect Good Actions.
text.en-trans: zangpo chö chir rabtu ngowar gyi

text.en: When it is time for me to die,
text.en-trans: dak ni chiwé dü jé gyurpa na

text.en: Let all that obscures me fade away, so
text.en-trans: dribpa tamché dak ni chir sal té

text.en: I look on Amitābha, there in person,
text.en-trans: ngönsum nangwa tayé dé tong né

text.en: And go at once to his pure land of Sukhāvatī.
text.en-trans: dewachen gyi zhing der rabtu dro

text.en: In that pure land, may I actualize every single one
text.en-trans: der song né ni mönlam didak kyang

text.en: Of all these aspirations!
text.en-trans: tamché malü ngön du gyurwar shok

text.en: May I fulfil them, each and every one,
text.en-trans: dedak malü dak gi yongsu kang

text.en: And bring help to beings for as long as the universe remains!
text.en-trans: jikten jisi semchen penpar gyi

text.en: Born there in a beautiful lotus flower,
text.en-trans: gyalwé kyilkhor zang zhing gawa der

text.en: In that excellent and joyous buddha realm,
text.en-trans: pemo dampa shintu dzé lé kyé

text.en: May the Buddha Amitābha himself
text.en-trans: nangwa tayé gyalwé ngönsum du

text.en: Grant me the prophecy foretelling my enlightenment!
text.en-trans: lungtenpa yang dak gi der tob shok

text.en: Having received the prophecy there,
text.en-trans: der ni dak gi lungten rab tob né

text.en: With my billions of emanations,
text.en-trans: trulpa mangpo jewa trak gya yi

text.en: Sent out through the power of my mind,
text.en-trans: lo yi tob kyi chok chu nam su yang

text.en: May I bring enormous benefit to sentient beings, in all the ten directions!
text.en-trans: semchen nam la penpa mangpo gyi

text.en: Through whatever small virtues I have gained
text.en-trans: zangpo chöpé mönlam tabpa yi

text.en: By reciting this “Aspiration to Good Actions”,
text.en-trans: gewa chungzé dak gi chi sakpa

text.en: May the virtuous wishes of all beings’ prayers and aspirations
text.en-trans: dé ni drowé mönlam gewa nam

text.en: All be instantly accomplished!
text.en-trans: kechik chik gi tamché jorwar shok

text.en: Through the true and boundless merit
text.en-trans: gangyang zangpo chöpa di ngöpé

text.en: Attained by dedicating this “Aspiration to Good Actions”,
text.en-trans: sönam tayé dampa gang tob dé

text.en: May all those now drowning in the ocean of suffering,
text.en-trans: drowa dukngal chuwor jingwa nam

text.en: Reach the supreme realm of Amitābha!
text.en-trans: öpakmepé né rab tobpar shok

text.en: May this King of Aspirations bring about
text.en-trans: mönlam gyalpo didak chok gi tso

text.en: The supreme aim and benefit of all infinite sentient beings;
text.en-trans: tayé drowa kün la pen jé ching

text.en: May they perfect what is described in this holy prayer, uttered by Samantabhadra!
text.en-trans: kuntuzangpö gyenpé zhung drub té

text.en: May the lower realms be entirely emptied!
text.en-trans: ngensong né nam malü tongpar shok

text.en: By the blessings of the buddhas who have attained the three kāyas,
text.en-trans: sangye ku sum nyepé jinlab dang

text.en: And the unchanging truth of reality
text.en-trans: chönyi mingyur denpé jinlab dang

text.en: As well as the unwavering aspirations of the Saṅgha,
text.en-trans: gendün miché dünpé jinlab kyi

text.en: May all the aspirations and dedication prayers be fulfilled!
text.en-trans: jitar ngö zhin mönlam drubpar shok
